{{Use dmy dates|date=December 2015}} {{Infobox philosopher |region = [[Western Philosophy]] |era = [[Contemporary philosophy|21st century Philosophy]] |color = #B0C4DE |image = Abdolkarimi3.JPG |name = Bijan Abdolkarimi |native_name = بیژن عبدالکریمی |birth_date = {{birth year and age|1963}} |birth_place = [[Tehran]], [[Iran]] |death_date = | alma_mater = [[Aligarh Muslim University]] (Ph.D.), [[University of Tehran]] (B.A. and M.A.) |school_tradition = [[Continental philosophy|Continental]] |main_interests = Critique of the Western Culture and Thought
[[Existential phenomenology]] |notable_ideas = [[Nietzscheian World]], [[End of Theology]] |influences = [[Martin Heidegger]], [[Ali Shariati]], [[Ahmad Fardid]], [[Reza Davari Ardakani]], [[Abdolkarim Soroush]] |influenced = | thesis_title = The Critique of Kantian Subjectivism (A Heideggerian Perspective) | thesis_url = http://shodhganga.inflibnet.ac.in/handle/10603/52171 | thesis_year = 2001 | doctoral_advisor = [[Syed Abdul Sayeed]] | academic_advisors = | doctoral_students = | notable_students = }} '''Bijan Abdolkarimi''' (born 1963 in [[Tehran]]) ({{lang-fa|بیژن عبدالکریمی}}) is an [[Iran]]ian philosopher, thinker, translator and editor.{{cite web|title=Abdolkarimi: Shariati's thought copes with Nihilism|url=http://www.ibna.ir/vdch6qnzw23nizd.01t2.html|publisher=[[Iran Book News Agency]]|accessdate=22 August 2012}}{{cite web|title=Schopenhauer; philosopher of culture and virtue|url=http://www.ibna.ir/prti3vazzt1arv2.ilct.html|publisher=[[Iran Book News Agency]]|accessdate=22 August 2012}}{{cite web |title=شوپنهاور فیلسوف فضیلت و فرهنگ است |url=http://www.farheekhtegan.ir/content/view/36038/44/ |publisher=[[Farheekhtegan|Farheekhtegan Newspaper]] |accessdate=22 August 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120209004230/http://www.farheekhtegan.ir/content/view/36038/44/ |archivedate=9 February 2012 |df=dmy }} He is associate professor of philosophy at [[Islamic Azad University North Tehran Branch]].{{cite web |title=استادان گروه فلسفه دانشگاه آزاد اسلامی واحد تهران شمال (Professors of Philosophy at Azad University) |url=http://ensani.iau-tnb.ac.ir/tabid/1272/Default.aspx |publisher=[[Islamic Azad University]] |accessdate=22 August 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120106152545/http://ensani.iau-tnb.ac.ir/tabid/1272/Default.aspx |archivedate=6 January 2012 |df=dmy }} His main interests are [[ontology]], [[political philosophy]] and the critique of [[religious]] and [[intellectual tradition]]s.{{cite web |title=ژورنالیسم و فلسفه در گفتگو با بیژن عبدالکریمی |url=http://www.hamshahrionline.ir/news-37040.aspx |publisher=[[Hamshahri Online]] |accessdate=22 August 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20111010092246/http://hamshahrionline.ir/news-37040.aspx |archivedate=10 October 2011 |df=dmy }} He claims to challenge the dominant [[ideological discourse]] in [[Iran]].{{cite web|title=عبدالکریمی از مواجهه توتالیتر با متن سخن گفت|url=http://www.ibna.ir/vdcf11dytw6d00a.igiw.html|publisher=[[Iran Book News Agency]]|accessdate=22 August 2012}}{{cite journal|last=Arzhang|first=Amin|title=Criticism of Islamic humanities|journal=[[Shargh Newspaper]]|date=23 November 2011|url=http://www.magiran.com/npview.asp?ID=2402412}} He has participated in debates at Iranian universities and also in [[IRIB TV4]] in which he has opposed the notion of [[Islamic humanities]].{{cite web|title=عبدالكريمي: مطهری در درک عقلانیت مدرن از نوعی عقب ماندگی تاریخی رنج می برد / قائمي نيا: امتياز مطهري جهش از مباحث سنتي به مباحث جهان معاصر است|url=http://snn.ir/news-13910221025.aspx|publisher=[[Daneshju News Agency]]|accessdate=23 August 2012|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120614022113/http://www.snn.ir/news-13910221025.aspx#|archive-date=14 June 2012|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|title=مناظره پارسانيا و عبدالكريمی درباره علوم انسانی برگزار می‌شود |url=http://iqna.ir/fa/news_detail.php?ProdID=899293 |publisher=[[Iranian Quran News Agency]] |accessdate=23 August 2012 }}{{dead link|date=November 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} {{cite web|title=عبدالكريمي: علوم انسانی اسلامی یک عبارت پارادوکسیکال و خود متناقض است|url=http://snn.ir/news-13910309211.aspx|publisher=[[Daneshju News Agency]]|accessdate=23 August 2012|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120603054818/http://snn.ir/news-13910309211.aspx#|archive-date=3 June 2012|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|title=طرح اسلامی‌سازی علوم انسانی شرق‌شناسی وارونه است|url=http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=13910309001405|publisher=[[Fars News Agency]]|accessdate=23 August 2012}} He is also a scholar of Heidegger's thought and philosophy.{{cite book|last=Jarvie|first=Ian Charles|title=Karl Popper: Life and time, and values in a world of facts|year=2006|publisher=Ashgate Publishing, Ltd|isbn=978-0-7546-5375-2|pages=152}}{{cite web|title=گفت وگوي "ايران" با دكتر بيژن عبدالكريمي: طنز تلخ هايدگر در ايران|url=http://www.magiran.com/npview.asp?ID=1509606|publisher=[[Iran Newspaper]]|accessdate=23 August 2012}}[http://www.ibna.ir/es/doc/shorttrans/217841/necesidad-de-confiar-la-celebraci%C3%B3n-los-premios-filosof%C3%ADa-a-las-ong Necesidad de confiar la celebración de los premios de Filosofía a las ONG] ==Views== The main characteristics of Abdolkarimi's thought may be summarized as follows: * Abdolkarimi seeks to present a spiritual, meditative interpretation of Heidegger's thought.{{cite web|title=بيژن عبدالكريمي :"هايدگر در ايران" تا اتمام نگارش جلد دوم منتشر نمي‌شود|url=http://www.farhangkhane.ir/news-stop/2078--l-r-.html|publisher=Farhangkhaneh Institution|accessdate=23 August 2012}} * The relation between the West and East is his main issue in his philosophical thinking. He strongly criticizes any ideological, theological understanding of the West and East. He emphasizes a historical, phenomenological understanding of these two traditions.{{cite web|title=دکتر عبدالکریمی: دعوت بزرگ شریعتی، تجدید عهد با سنت تاریخی ماست|url=http://iranianstudies.org/fa/%D8%AF%DA%A9%D8%AA%D8%B1-%D8%B9%D8%A8%D8%AF%D8%A7%D9%84%DA%A9%D8%B1%DB%8C%D9%85%DB%8C-%D8%AF%D8%B9%D9%88%D8%AA-%D8%A8%D8%B2%D8%B1%DA%AF-%D8%B4%D8%B1%DB%8C%D8%B9%D8%AA%DB%8C%D8%8C-%D8%AA%D8%AC%D8%AF/|publisher=[[Academy of Iranian Studies in London]]|accessdate=23 August 2012}} * He has worked on the theory of the [[end of theology]] and its critical connotations. Following [[Gianni Vattimo]], he believes that the main philosophical characteristic of our time is the [[destroyed ontology]]. Abdolkarimi interprets Vattimo's idea as the "metaphysicslessness of our time". But in the context of Abdolkarimi's thought, the term [[metaphysics]] is not merely in the Greek sense and refers to any historical theoretical tradition.{{cite news|title=تفكر تئولوژيك|url=http://www.magiran.com/npview.asp?ID=1050844|accessdate=23 August 2012|newspaper=[[Shargh Newspaper]]}}Interview With IRIB's Channel 4, September 2011 * Abdolkarimi believes that the human being's future thought is a kind of nonsecular-nontheological thinking, namely a way of thinking that is in disagreement to the secular, materialistic interpretation of the world, but at the same time does not settle in any historic, theological systems.{{cite web|title=جهان نیچه‌ای بی‌معناست|url=http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=8706010280|publisher=[[Fars News Agency]]|accessdate=23 August 2012}} ==Bibliography== * ''Reflections on the Paradox of Directed Democracy'', Eshraghieh Press, Tehran, 1989. * ''Shariati and Being Politicized'', Resa Institute of Cultural Service, Tehran, 1995. * ''Thought and Politics'', Tehran, Scientific & Cultural Press (Affiliated to The Ministry of Science and Technology), 1977. * ''The Story of Me and Thou'', Tehran, The Press of the Institute of the Critique of Culture, 2001. * ''Heidegger and Transcendence'' (A Commentary of Heidegger's Interpretation of Kant's Critique of Pure Reason), Tehran, The Press of the Institute of the Critique of Culture, 2002. * ''Emancipation or Dominance?'' (A Critique of the System of Religious Education in Iran), with Mohammad Ali Mohammadi’s cooperation, Tehran, The Press of the Institute of the Critique of Culture, 2002. * ''Monism or Pluralism?'' (Mobile Thinking or Homeless Thought) (A Critique of [[Daryoush Shaygan]]’s Modern Enchantedness), Tehran, The Press of the Institute of the Critique of Culture, under printing. * ''Nietzscheian World and Us'', Elm Publication, Tehran, 2009. * ''Hegel or Marx?'' (A Critique of Iranian Intellectuals), Tehran, The Press of the Institute of the Critique of Culture, 2002. * ''Heidegger in Iran'', Iranian Institute of Philosophy, Tehran, 2013. == See also == *[[Intellectual Movements in Iran]] *[[Iranian philosophy]] *[[Religious intellectualism in Iran]] ==Sources== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://abdolkarimi.org/ Abdolkarimi's Official Website] * [http://connection.ebscohost.com/c/essays/48300043/conceptual-approaches-contemporary-iranian-religious-reformism Conceptual Approaches in Contemporary Iranian Religious Reformism] * [https://soundcloud.com/you/tracks Collection of Abdolkarimi's Lectures in Farsi] {{Martin Heidegger}} {{Authority control}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Abdolkarimi, Bijan}} [[Category:Iranian writers]] [[Category:Muslim reformers]] [[Category:Iranian philosophers]] [[Category:Islamic Azad University faculty]] [[Category:1963 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Aligarh Muslim University alumni]] [[Category:University of Tehran alumni]] [[Category:People from Tehran]] [[Category:Heidegger scholars]] [[Category:Philosophy academics]] [[Category:Existentialists]] [[Category:Hermeneutists]] [[Category:20th-century philosophers]] [[Category:21st-century philosophers]] [[Category:Philosophers of culture]] [[Category:Continental philosophers]] [[Category:Phenomenologists]] [[Category:Commentators on Plato]] [[Category:Nietzsche scholars]] [[Category:Philosophers of nihilism]] [[Category:English–Persian translators]] [[Category:Persian-language writers]]
